cards.name: Mace Tyrell
cards.text: Reaction: After a [tyrell] character enters play under your control, pay 1 gold to have Mace Tyrell gain 1 power. (Limit once per phase.) Action: Kneel your faction card to remove another [tyrell] character you control from the game until the beginning of the next phase.

cards.name: Brienne of Tarth
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Brienne of Tarth is participating, if her STR is: - 6 or higher, she gains 1 power. - 10 or higher, choose another character. It gets +3 STR until the end of the phase. - 15 or higher, stand her and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Ser Garlan Tyrell
cards.text: Action: During a challenge in which a Knight character you control is attacking alone, discard 1 card from your hand to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)
cards.flavor: "A valiant deed unsung is no less valiant."

cards.name: The Queen of Thorns
cards.text: Insight. Reaction: After The Queen of Thorns is knelt, discard an event from your hand to search your deck for an event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
cards.flavor: "All these kings would do a deal better if they would put down their swords and listen to their mothers."

cards.name: Highgarden Honor Guard
cards.text: Ambush (6). No attachments. Reduce the cost to ambush Highgarden Honor Guard by 1 for each The Reach location you control.

cards.name: Margaery Tyrell
cards.text: While Margaery Tyrell is attacking, she gets +1 STR for each defending character. Reaction: After Margaery Tyrell is declared as an attacker, choose and kneel a character controlled by the defending player. That character is participating in the challenge as a defender.
cards.designer: Card design by 2011 European Melee Champion, Gregoire Lefebvre.

cards.name: The Knight of Flowers
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After you play an event, The Knight of Flowers gets +2 STR until the end of the phase.
cards.flavor: "Most deserve to be forgotten. The heroes will always be remembered. The best."

cards.name: Willas Tyrell
cards.text: Action: Kneel Willas Tyrell. Then, if you control: - Margaery Tyrell, stand her. - The Knight of Flowers, he gains insight until the end of the phase. - Ser Garlan Tyrell, he gains renown until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Garth the Gross
cards.text: While you control another [tyrell] Lord character, Garth the Gross gains a [military] icon and renown. While you control a [tyrell] Lady character, Garth the Gross gains an [intrigue] icon and gets +2 STR.
cards.flavor: "Garth has served me well as Lord Seneschal, as he served my father before me." <cite>Mace Tyrell</cite>

cards.name: The Blue Bard
cards.text: Interrupt: When the Blue Bard leaves play, search the top 10 cards of your deck for any number of Song events, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
cards.flavor: "As a boy, I was called Wat. A fine name for a plowboy, less fitting for a singer."

cards.name: Emissary of the Hightower
cards.text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After Emissary of the Hightower enters play, choose an event in your discard pile. Until the end of the phase, you may play that event as if it were in your hand. If you do, remove it from the game instead of placing it into your discard pile.

cards.name: Green-Apple Knight
cards.text: Green-Apple Knight gets +1 STR for each other Knight character you control. While you control 2 or more other Knight characters, Green-Apple Knight does not kneel when declared as an attacker.

cards.name: Desmera Redwyne
cards.text: Reaction: After a character is removed from a challenge, pay 1 gold to give that character +2 STR or -1 STR until the end of the phase.
cards.flavor: "Redwyne has a nicely dowered daughter..." <cite>Daven Lannister</cite>

cards.name: Maester Ballabar
cards.text: Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating character, kneel Maester Ballabar to choose a character with the lowest STR among participating characters. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.

cards.name: Highgarden Courtier
cards.text: Reaction: After another character’s STR is increased by a card effect, kneel Highgarden Courtier to stand that character. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Jousting Knight
cards.text: Jousting Knight does not contribute its STR to a challenge unless it is attacking or defending alone.
cards.flavor: Other riders Sansa did not know; hedge knights from the Fingers and Highgarden and the mountains of Dorne, unsung freeriders and new-made squires...

cards.name: The Hightower
cards.text: Reaction: After a [tyrell] character enters play under your control, gain 1 gold and draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: From where it stood atop the bluffs of Battle Island, its shadow cut the city like a sword.

cards.name: Redwyne Straits
cards.text:
Limited.
+2 Income.

cards.name: Jousting Pavilion
cards.text: Each Knight character you control gets +1 STR while attacking or defending alone.
cards.flavor: The jousting went all day and into the dusk, the hooves of the great warhorses pounding down the lists until the field was a ragged wasteland of torn earth.

cards.name: Queen of the Seven Kingdoms
cards.text: Lady character only. Attached character gains the Queen trait. Action Stand attached character and remove it from the challenge to choose a participating character. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Tourney Lance
cards.text: Knight character only. Attached character gets +1 STR. While attached character is attacking alone, the defending player cannot declare more than 1 character as a defender.

cards.name: Melee at Bitterbridge
cards.text: Action: Choose X participating characters. Each character with the highest STR among those characters gains renown until the end of the challenge. Each other chosen character does not contribute its STR to the challenge.

cards.name: "Six Maids in a Pool"
cards.text: Action: Draw 1 card for each Lady character you control.
cards.flavor: Six maids there were in a spring-fed pool...

cards.name: Hidden Thorns
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, the losing opponent chooses and discards 2 cards from his or her hand. Then, if you control The Queen of Thorns, return Hidden Thorns to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: River Runner
cards.text: While River Runner is attacking, each character with power cannot be declared as a defender.
cards.flavor: "Use every smuggler's trick you know, the black sails, the hidden coves, whatever it requires." <cite>Stannis Baratheon</cite>

cards.name: Bend the Knee
cards.text: Play only if you control a standing King character. Action: Choose and kneel a Lord or Lady character.
cards.flavor: "No man has ever died from bending his knee." <cite>Balon Greyjoy</cite>

cards.name: Drowned God's Apostle
cards.text: Reaction: After you win dominance, kill Drowned God's Apostle to put a non-unique [greyjoy] character with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your dead pile.

cards.name: Corpse Lake
cards.text: Reaction: After a character is discarded from an opponent's deck, Corpse Lake gains 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)

cards.name: The Hound
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After The Hound enters play, choose a Knight character without attachments and return it to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: "I am no knight. I spit on them and their vows."

cards.name: Lion's Tooth
cards.text: Unique [lannister] character only. Ambush (2). Attached character gets +1 STR. Action: During a challenge in which attached character is participating, sacrifice Lion’s Tooth to choose a participating character with printed cost 3 or lower and return it to its owner’s hand.

cards.name: The Bastard of Godsgrace
cards.text: Renown. Challenges Action: Discard 1 power from The Bastard of Godsgrace to reduce the cost of the next card you play or ambush this phase by 2.

cards.name: Hellholt
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge by 5 or more STR, Hellholt gains 1 power.
cards.flavor: "Half of the Ullers are half-mad, the saying went, and the other half are worse."

cards.name: Small Paul
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When Small Paul is killed, search the top X cards of your deck for any number of Steward characters, reveal them, and add them to your hand. X is your reserve value. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Broken Vows
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Give control of a [thenightswatch] character you control to an opponent. Then, take control of a non-loyal character that player controls with a lower printed cost.

cards.name: Ser Dontos Hollard
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When a Lady character would be killed or discarded from play, stand Ser Dontos Hollard to save that character.
cards.flavor: "... all those years I was a knight, I was truly a fool, and now that I am a fool I think... I think I may find it in me to be a knight again..."

cards.name: Last Hearth
cards.text: Action: Kneel Last Hearth to give a participating [stark] character +2 STR until the end of the challenge. (+3 STR instead if there are fewer than 3 plot cards in your used pile.)

cards.name: Qotho
cards.text: Action: Discard 2 [targaryen] cards from your hand to put Qotho into play from your hand.
cards.flavor: Qotho was ever the cruelest of the bloodriders.

cards.name: Tokar
cards.text:
[targaryen] character only.
Attached character gets +1 STR for each attachment it has.
While attached character is participating in a challenge, each character without attachments cannot gain power.

cards.name: Archmaester Ebrose
cards.text: Action: Kneel a Maester character to choose and stand another Maester character. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: "Morn will be upon us sooner than we'd like, and Archmaester Ebrose will be speaking on the properties of urine. Those who mean to forge a silver link would do well not to miss his talk." <cite>Armen the Acolyte</cite>

cards.name: Faceless Man
cards.text: Ambush (4). Challenges Action: Choose a character in a dead pile. Until the end of the phase, Faceless Man gains each of that character's printed challenge icons, keywords, faction affiliations, and Traits. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.designer: Card design by 2013 Overall World Champion, Ryan Jones.

cards.name: Citadel Novice
cards.text: Reaction: After Citadel Novice is knelt, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an attachment or a Maester character, draw it. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: He had only been at the Citadel for a year, yet already he had forged three links of his maester's chain.

cards.name: The Citadel
cards.text: Action: Kneel The Citadel to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Maester character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
cards.flavor: "There are so many books at the Citadel that no man can hope to read them all." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>

cards.name: Strangler
cards.text: Terminal. While attached character is participating in a challenge, set its STR to 1. (Other modifiers do not raise or lower its STR.)
cards.flavor: Dissolved in wine, it would make the muscles of a man's throat clench tighter than any fist.

cards.name: Words Are Wind
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate, that opponent must choose, either: cancel those effects, or you draw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: "I put more trust in deeds." <cite>Daenerys Targaryen</cite>

cards.name: The Conclave
cards.text: Your deck may include non-loyal Maester characters from any faction. Your deck must include at least 12 Maester characters. Before placing setup cards, place the top 7 cards of your deck facedown under this agenda. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating Maester character, choose 1 card under this agenda and switch it with the top card of your deck.

cards.name: Wardens of the South
cards.text: Reaction: After a [tyrell] character you control is declared as an attacker or defender, that character gets +2 STR until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Besieged
cards.text: At least one character must be declared as a defender in each challenge, if able.

cards.name: Your King Commands It
cards.text: Each non-King, non-Queen character cannot gain power.

cards.name: The Spider's Web
cards.text: Reaction: After claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge you won, you may initiate an additional [intrigue] challenge this phase. Until the end of the phase, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during [intrigue] challenges. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Now It Comes To War
cards.text: Forced Interrupt: When claim is applied for an [intrigue] or [power] challenge, the attacking player may choose to apply [military] claim instead.

cards.name: Trade Routes
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. Gain 1 gold for each location you control and each location that opponent controls.

cards.name: Nothing Burns Like The Cold
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player chooses an attachment and a non-limited location he or she controls, if able, and discards each of those cards from play (cannot be saved).
